typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{~id} as string,
		{titleType:String} as string,
		{primaryTitle:String} as string,
		{isAdult:Bool} as boolean,
		{startYear:String} as string,
		{endYear:String} as string,
		{runtimeMinutes:String} as string,
		{averageRating:Float} as float,
		{numVotes:Float} as float,
		{~label} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
Select1 split({averageRating:Float} > 5.0,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Stream1, Stream2)
source1 derive(owner = "Minura Punchihewa") ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, source2 lookup({~id} == Column_1,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		{~id},
		{titleType:String},
		{primaryTitle:String},
		{isAdult:Bool},
		{startYear:String},
		{endYear:String},
		{runtimeMinutes:String},
		{averageRating:Float},
		{numVotes:Float},
		{~label},
		owner,
		Column_1,
		Column_2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ConditionalSplit1@Stream1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@Stream2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		{~id} as string,
		{titleType:String} as string,
		{primaryTitle:String} as string,
		{isAdult:Bool} as string,
		{startYear:String} as string,
		{endYear:String} as string,
		{runtimeMinutes:String} as string,
		{averageRating:Float} as string,
		{numVotes:Float} as string,
		{~label} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 exists({~id} == Column_1,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
